DataElement.preferredName: Most Recent Sex Behavior New Partner Encounter Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Related to the most recent sex encounter involving a new sexual partner._A form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse._The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Most Recent Sex Behavior New Partner Encounter
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Related to the most recent sex encounter involving a new sexual partner._A form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Nearest to the present time.:Sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse. (from Wikipedia)

Concepts.definition: Behaviors involved with sexual arousal and/or intercourse.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.:A person that is associated with another person in some manner or action.:Each individual, unique interaction between two subjects of interest.

Concepts.definition: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
A person that is associated with another person in some manner or action.
Each individual, unique interaction between two subjects of interest.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
